2 Buttons

Reusable button elements in products.

2.1 Button

A button suitable for giving stars to someone.

HTML markup
<button class="btn {$modifiers}">Button</button>
<button class="btn btn-small {$modifiers}">Button</button>
normal
Original status
:hover

Subtle hover highlight.

:active

Subtle active status.

.disabled

Disabled Status

.btn-primary

A primary button.

.btn-primary:hover

A primary button with hover status.

.btn-primary:active

A primary button with active status.

.btn-primary.disabled

A primary button with disabled status.

.btn-ruby

A Trend Micro Branding style button, using for the major visual specific.

.btn-ruby:hover

A Trend Micro Branding style button with hover status.

.btn-ruby:active

A Trend Micro Branding style button with active status.

.btn-ruby.disabled

A Trend Micro Branding style button with disabled status.

2.2 Buttons for downloading App

HTML markup
<button class="btn {$modifiers}">Button</button>
normal
Original status
.btn-google-play

Subtle active status.

.btn-google-play:hover

Subtle hover highlight.

.btn-google-play:active

Subtle active status.

Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
